mapper.select: select ot.id, order_detail_id, technology_id, content, price,ata.technology_name,factory_code from order_technology ot left join app_technology_attribute ata on ot.technology_id=ata.id where order_detail_id=#{detailId}

SELECT osw.id, order_detail_id, position_id, asp.position_name, color_id, ddi.item_name as colorName, font_id, ddi1.item_name as fontName, size_id, icon_id, as1.stitch_work_name as iconName, content, price FROM order_stitch_work osw LEFT JOIN sys_data_dict_item ddi ON osw.color_id = ddi.item_code AND ddi.type_code = 'emb_color' LEFT JOIN sys_data_dict_item ddi1 ON osw.font_id = ddi1.item_code AND ddi1.type_code = 'emb_font' LEFT JOIN app_stitchwork_position asp ON osw.position_id = asp.id LEFT JOIN app_stitchwork as1 ON osw.icon_id = as1.id where order_detail_id=#{detailId}
